data.text: 12-in-1 A98BF454 Has problems Out of 12 games, only 1 Works: Flickies. 16-Bit Rhythm Land Japan, USA, Europe 67271302 Works Force Japan Region (NTSC)to avoid downscaled screen 16 Tiles Mahjong h1C 6BE25FD5 Doesn't work Game crashes after a few seconds 16 Zhang Mahjong Taiwan 36407C82 Works 16 Zhang Mahjong II Taiwan B4F4249F Doesn't work Black screen Action 52 USA 29FF58AE Has problems Tried a few (not all 52) and they work. Game loads and Works but doesnt RESET correctly.
